column1: I am very happy with the Neutrogena Bright Boost Brightening Gel Face Cream. This is a very hydrating gel and makes my skin feel super soft and hydrated. My skin has been looking bright and shiny. My skin feels so much more hydrated and looks much brighter. My skin is no longer dull and dry looking. I'm very happy with this gel face cream. I already bought more and some for friends as well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Absolutely love this new product! The packaging is beautiful and the product smells amazing. I love the shimmery nature of the gel cream and how easy it goes on. I haven't noticed too significant of a difference in my skin yet, but it is a pleasure to put on and wear under makeup! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really love that this Neutrogena® Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream works amazing to make my skin look and feel younger and more smooth. I felt like it worked really quickly to make it have more natural healthy glow that was noticeable. I got tons of complaints from friends and family about how much my skin looked clear and bright [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena® Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream Works great! I really loved how Neutrogena® Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream left my skin feeling healthier and refreshed. Neutrogena® Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream Is great for all skin types. You only need a little bit so it last a long time. Neutrogena® Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream Is my go to moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
It is well suitable for oil skin since it is gel moisturizer. It brighted my skin and very soft and smooth [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the smell of the cream I get a lot of compliments on that alone, not to mention it's a great skin care product. I use it out of the shower and it's made my skin glow ! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream works well with my sensitive skin and is moisturizing without being greasy or causing breakouts. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really love this moisturizer not only makes my skin feeling hydrated the whole day but it gives you a glow, it has very little particules of shimmer and it just looks great [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is such a great moisturizer! It makes my skin super soft and hydrated all day. I have oily skin and this gave me such a beautiful glow with any extra oil or greasiness. I will definitely be repurchasing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena bright boost brightening gel moisturizer feels like silk on your face. You only need to put a small amount on your finger and apply it to your face. It gave me the instant cool feeling that I like on my face. While it didn't dry out my skin it did keep it soft supple and moisturized throughout the day. I really like this because it doesn't make my face oily at all like others do. I'll buy this for my usual moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I���ve never thought this product work's as magic to me. I been trying different brands of brightening moisturizer face cream for a year and I always end up disappointment. But this one is amazing! I'm in love with the smell and the feeling after applying it in your face. I would highly recommend it to my friends and family. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

love the smell it smell really good but what i am loving is how my skin feel soft after i use it! in fact i been using this in the morning and when it is time for bed and have notice that it is helping my dark spot but only time and using this daily for a week or full month will tell and a little do go along way and love that it is oil free and not greasy feeling and in the end this will restore brightness & kick-start tired and dull skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

At first glance I really liked the look in the smell of Neutrogena Bright Boost brightening gel moisturizer face cream. It has a nice fragrance and a cute pink color with some glitter in it. Once I used it though I was not a huge fan. It did not moisturize my face as much as I expected it to. I also found that my face felt slightly waxy and sticky once it dried. My skin does not seem brighter either just seems a little bit drier. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Wanted to love it! heard so much good stuff about Neutrogena boost line! Tried it for 3 days and unfortunately broke me out.....I have very sensitive skin and can't use a lot of drugstore products. But Neutrogena was exception until now...Did see some brightening and made my skin very soft but caused large cystic under the skin acne! But if you've tried hydroboost and loved it, you'll love this as well. But unfortunately not for sensitive skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Moisturizer has a light scent, glides onto skin nicely, feels moisturizing but not heavy, also has some mica in it which at first I thought I would hate, but I love the glowy look it gives. Has AHA acids in it to help exfoliate/bring radiance to skin so you need to wear sunscreen with it. My least favorite part is the way it smells -- Neutrogena should produce more products without fragrance. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used this product for three days now,so far I like what I am seeing. First of all, I love how great this product smells. It's wonderful. My skin feels amazing after applying, no greasy feeling. I love the shimmer that is in the cream. I also noticed my dark circles under my eyes, have been less intense. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I sampled the Neutrogena Bright Boost Brightening Gel and I was a bit disappointed by it. I enjoyed the scent of it (not too strong but subtle) and the gel went on easily but it left a sticky feeling on my face which I didn't like. I was very disappointed with the effect it had on my foundation. It caused my foundation to cake and leave lines on my face. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
You could really tell a difference in my skin within 3 days of using the product. My face was glowing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena always innovating and creating wonderful products; this product smells exquisite, a nice texture, and the most important my skin looks shiny and perfect. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The bright boost was very moisturizing. It had a nice light fragrance, nothing overpowering. I saw a little bit of difference in my dark spots but nothing drastic. My only complaint is when mixed with other products it clumps up (makeup, sunscreen, etc). So using it at night was all I could do. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love all of the Neutrogena brand products, the Neutrogena bright boost brightening gel moisturizer face cream is now a favorite of my daily face regime. My skin feels so clean, soft, bright and clear after each use! I love it and I would definitely recommend! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is a great face cream that gives your skin a wonderful bouncy, moisturized plumpness. I especially love how quickly it absorbs and does not leave you greasy or sticky on the surface or irritate at all. Definitely will consider buying when I need another jar! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena bright boost brightening gel moisturizer face cream is a great product. It has a faint citrusy smell that dissipates quickly. It feels light on my skin when applied, yet leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth all day long. After using this product for a week so skin feels clean and smooth with no negative effects. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this Neutrogena Bright Boost Brighte ing Gel Moisturizer! It smells amazing! It makes my skin look nice and bright! The container and appearance of the moisturizer is pleasant! I will be purchasing! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love how amazing Neutrogena Bright Boost Brightening Moisturizer Face Cream smells! It goes on so silky and smooth and my face has never felt more healthy. I immediately could see the results and my face doesn't look dull and unhealthy anymore! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena bright boost brightening gel moisturizer face cream is so amazing. It instantly made my tired dull skin bright and glowing. It also smells great too! Hometester club sent me this but the review is all mine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream is a great addition to my morning beauty regimen. Easy to use, it doesn't leave a greasy feeling or awkward lingering smell. Definitely will keep this in my routine! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this gel face cream. It is so easy to use and my fave looks and feels soft and smooth after using it. I like that it absorbs quickly and does not leave my face feeling oily or sticky. This is a definite for my beauty routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My skin looks amazing, I get compliments on it all day! This gel has changed my life. My skin was dry with lots of fine wrinkles, now it glows! Thank you for the opportunity to try this product. I Love it, and will purchase in the future. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Natural glow

I love this Neutrogena bright boost brightening gel moisturizer so much! I have been using it for a couple weeks now and my skin has the most amazing glow. It's absorbs quickly and leaves a nice finish. It smells amazing and has a very nice invigorating scent to wake up your senses. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using Neutrogena Bright Boost Brightening Gel moisturizer face cream for about a week now, an I notice that my skin is getting brighter. I'm loving it! But avoid long exposure to the sun for it will hurt your face a bit. My skin is more sensitive when I stay out in the sun too long. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I recently tried the neutrogena brightening facial lotion. I have noticed in my 30s my skin is starting to get lackluster. I noticed since using this lotion it has brought out new bright skin. My skin is sensitive so I used it every other day. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is a lightweight formula that not only brightens but moisturizes your face daily. I have a newborn and with the lack of sleep, I have been looking a little more tired than usual and needing a little boost/brightening for my face and this definitely did the trick. I have now added it to my daily facial cleansing routine. Definitely a must have product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this neutrogena bright boost brightening gel moisturizer so much! I have been using it for a couple weeks now and my skin has the most amazing glow. It's absorbs quickly and leaves a nice finish [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena® Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream felt really nice and light on my face. Sometimes my skin can become very irritated using certain products but I didn't feel any of that with this face cream. It did a good job at moisturizing and keeping my skin fresh throughout the day. My skin looked somewhat brighter, but using this product a little longer could change my opinion on the effectiveness of this so right now I can give it 4 out of 5 stars. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My first thoughts on this product was that the packaging was beautiful. It looks like an expensive luxurious product and it works like one too. Within a week of using my skin looks more bright , a pretty glowing complexion and skin is super soft and smooth. It smells wonderful and does its job just like it says. I would definitely recommend to family and friends or anyone for that matter. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love the results from trying Neutrogena Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream! It smells amazing and it leaves my skin feels SO soft and smooth. It doesn't take much, either. I'm definitely noticing a difference in my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I feel that my skin is more hydrated. It is brighter and I even put some on the back of my hands. I noticed a difference one day when I had accedently got it on one hand and not the other. My skin looked smoother. The thing I don't like is that sometimes I'll rub my face and have some come off. Like roll off. It's like it almost makes me feel dirty. Even though I know I'm clean. Other than that it's great. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This stuff really works if you apply it religiously. Its light weighted cream that penetrate into your skin as soon as you apply. It non greasy and leaves skin moisturized and well hydrated. I am using it from last 2 weeks and can visibly well a brightness boost and lightening of black spots on my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am very impressed with this product. I enjoy the smell. This product is lightweight and I like the slight shimmer in it. I did notice that my face is slightly brighter and it appears smoother. The only negative factor is that if I rub my face shortly after the application there is slight residue that comes off and it does leave my face feeling a bit flimsy feeling. But overall I like it will continue to use it and recommend. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love a gel moisturizer and am glad that I got to try this one out that's drugstore! It definitely competes with high end ones. It felt good on the skin. My skin is sensitive towards some moisturizers and turns red and this one did not do that. I will be continuing using it [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like this moisturizer! It feels really good on my face and neck. It smells great, not too strong. It has just the slightest shimmer in it which I loved! It leaves my skin feeling brighter, smooth and a bit tighter as well. Overall I really liked this product and will most likely purchase in the future. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried Neutrogena® Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream and love it! It has a subtle pink glow that makes your skin look instantly awake and luminous. The cream is a little heavy for everyday use during the hot summertime, but doesn't cause breakouts and is perfect for a boost of hydration. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The gel is great feeling and easy to apply. My reason for a lower rating is the scent that is used. It caused irritation to my eyes even though I didn't use near them! It's scent is okay but it does have an older lady perfume type scent. It is kinda off pink shimmering gel and I didn't see any boost in brightness to my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved the Neutrogena® Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream. It is nice cream for daily use. Gets absorbed in skin really quick and leaves a nice glow behind. I loved to wear it on its own with no make up. Smells really good and have a nice texture. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is a really great moisturizer from Neutrogena. It smells great but light and is easy to get out of the jar. You didnt meed to use alot and it spread across my face gently. My facr appeared some a little brighter, not dull, and absolutely no irritation. Also, the packaging is a honest, nice style and invites you to try this facial product. I would definitely recommend this product to others! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love love love this cream!! It is officially part of my night time routine and even my make up routine. When I'm running late I grab some face cream and a lipstick to freshen up my look for the day. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really loved this product. It's so rich that a little goes a long way. It smells good and leaves my skin moisturized. There is a lot of product and because you do not need to use much you will have it for a while. My skin looks brighter and dewy after use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena bright boost brightening gel moisturizer makes my face like soft silk. Just use a small amount of cream on your face, and it gives an instant fresh feeling and doesn't make your face dry at all. Keep my face soft supple and moisturized throughout the day. I like this gel because it doesn't make my face oily at all as others do. I'll be going to buy this in the future. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love this Neutrogena Bright Boost face cream. I have naturally dry skin and find it challenging to find the right product. This is a Win! Over the past week, I have routinely used day and night. I have noticed a difference. Where I can get red some places, my skin looks more even toned. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Smells AMAZING and feels even better! The texture is beautiful and the lotion shimmers and glides beautifully onto my skin. My texture is noticeably softer and my complexion and acne scarring is lighter! Totally recommended for morning and night time usage! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Neutrogena Bright Boost Brightening Gel is great! My skin feels smooth and looks much more even toned. It is easy to rub in and does not leave my skin feeling greasy at all. It has a nice, soft scent to it and is definitely a product I would recommend to others. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena® Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream is a great moisturizer for combo to dry skin. It is lightweight, absorbed quickly, and felt great on the skin. If your skin has dry patches, you may need to go heavier on the product, but overall it provided moisture on my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I wasn't the biggest fan of this brightening face cream. Bad acne and the Neutrogena Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream do not mix. Found that out quick. However, if you need help with dullness, this is your thing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream was definitely impressive to me. The texture is great & it goes on smooth & feels light, not heavy. Made skin much softer & skin seemed brighter after using for over a week. Would absolutely recommend! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I normally love Neutrogena products, but I will not be finishing or purchasing the bright boost brightening gel moisturizer face cream. I tried it multiple times and every time it immediately peeled. I was unable to get it to stay on and look smooth. I didn't notice any brightening effects either. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I absolutely loved this cream!
I've been using it daily and noticed a change right after the first day. I am really happy with the improvements I've been seeing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizing gel is so soothing and refreshing to the skin. I love the little flex of shimmer in this product it really leaves the skin glowing, brightened and soft to the touch. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer is awesome! It's a gel cream, so there is no stickiness or oiliness...It's light, but powerful. After a week's use, I've noticed my skin looks so much more radiant and plump! There's a light sparkle, so your skin absolutely glows! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used Neutrogena Bright Boost Face cream for one week. The texture of the cream is smooth with not an over powering smell. The cream absorbs into skin great without leaving an oily shine. Great product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is a nice thick cream that absorbs quickly into the skin. It has a pleasant fragrance that doesn't linger. The active ingredients in this save me time because I can apply this in one step when I was previously applying my aha and moisturizer seperately. It would be even better if it included sunscreen! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I didn't see instant results as claimed, but it really delivers good results upon continuous use. I have been using this gel moisturizer for a week now and my skin is visibly smoother and brighter. This would be a staple in my skin care routine going forward. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I overall really liked this brightening gel face cream, by Neutrogena. I can almost count on them to give great products that stand up for the say they do. This brightening boost is very smooth and goes on smooth, without leaving a greasy residue. I love that it is not too greasy for my oily prone skin, and can use it daily with no problems. I use some under my eyes also to make my under eye area appear brighter. It leaves my skin so soft and supple. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream is a very high quality product. When I open the bottle, I can already smell its refreshing, gentle scent. The gel is light and non-greasy. It is almost immediately absorbed by my skin the moment I put it on. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The bright boost gel is amazing!! It's super hydrating and nourishing! I use a smaller amount during my morning facial routine because I'm oily, and used a more generous amount at night! This has done a great job brightening my face overall but also lightening my dark spots! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have Been using this product for about two weeks. I can Tell a huge difference in the way my face feels and looks. It gives it a brightness to it. Before my face had big pores. I've noticed that my pores of shrunken by 50%. I have Also noticed that it gives my face a energy to it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This cream felt so pleasant on my skin! It absorbed quickly and did not have an overwhelming scent. It really left my skin feeling soft and moisturized without feeling too greasy or affecting my makeup. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This gel moisturizer is really fun to use as its texture is smooth and easy to spread on skin. Have been using for a week and I can feel my skin texture is a little smooth and complexion is more glowing. Its pleasant scent is really refreshing and invigorating. I would continue using this face cream to achieve healthy skin. Highly recommended. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really enjoyed Neutrogena Bright Boost Mosterizing Face cream! Bright Boost has a lovely soft scent not overpowering or perfumey. The gel cream goes on so smoothly and it makes your face feel so hydradted and happy! I use it everyday as my moisturizer! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was expecting to get a sticky feeling after applying but all I got was a nice smooth, soft finish. This was perfect for use alone and under my makeup. I feel it showed immediate results by making my skin look more refreshed and bright. I also didn't break out while using this which is a plus. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the smell and very easy to apply. Just a small amount can apply whole face. This gel helps my face become more moisture and hydrated. The color of product is so pretty. I love Neutrogena product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After using multiple moisturizers this one has been the only one that has made a true difference on my skin. I have used this product for only one week and the difference is so noticeable! It has improved the overall look and feel of my skin. I have very dry skin and often look tired in the mornings, this product immediately makes my skin fresh and moisturized! This is my go to from now on! My skin is glowing and it feels super healthy! Thank you Neutrogena [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I absolutely love this brightening gel moisturizer. My skin not only looks great after using this moisturizer but feels soft and smooth. It awakens my skin making me feel refreshed. Since using this product my make up goes on smooth and I have received complements that My skin is “glowing”. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Overall, I like this Moisturizer. It smells nice and I do think it has helped brighten up my complexion a little. The downside for me, is I feel like it leaves a filmy feeling. It doesn't soak into my skin as well as I would like, I cam definitely feel it on my skin after using it. I will continue to use it, but at night because I don't like the way it feels all day on my face. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love the Nutrigena Bright Boos Brightening Gel Mousturizer. I have been using it on my very dry and sensitive skin after my shower and I've noticed a great improvement in my skin. After using for a few days my skin looks and feels refreshed and awake! I like the gel formula, it absorbs nicely and leaves no residue. I have sensitive skin a d was able to use this product with no adverse reaction at all. I'd reccomend this to anyone who wants to refresh their dull dry skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Overall my first thought was it had a nice heavy package that put me in the mind of department store products. The smell is amazing, the product is not too light or too heavy. I had a good layer of moisture for the day and I noticed a little brightening effect from the shimmer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream is a lightweight cream that gives you immediate long lasting results. My skin feels healthier and brighter than ever! I can notice it even when I have makeup on. It even has a pleasant fresh scent. I definitely recommend Bright Boost to anyone looking for a great face cream. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this boost brightening gel moisturizer face cream, its lightweight not greasy and have a pleasant scent.. It makes my face so soft, bright and glowing, it work so well with my makeup regimen, Im amazed at how it make my skin look.. I would definitely recommend it to family and friends.. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This face cream smells great but does not irritate my skin. Makes my skin feel hydrated and softer. I'm glad that my skin is smoother and brighter, and it's also looks better. The only concern that I have is that keeping AHA on the face whole day or whole night may make skin sensitive. But overall good results from this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like the Neutrogena Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream. It has a pleasant scent and soaks into the skin really well. My face was brighter and softer within minutes. The softness lasted all day. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Neutrogena Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream has a very pleasant feeling on the face. It made my skin glowy and super soft. I love that it doesn't have a super strong fragrance to it. The smell is very subtle. Overall it left my skin feeling great. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Neutrogena Bright Boost Brightening gel Moisturizer face cream went on extremely well. It left my skin glowing, but not oily which I love! I did wish it had a better scent or maybe even came in a floral scent. I will be buying and telling my friend to purchase this product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love how it feels on my face, how it smells and how it makes my skin look. I haven't used it for a full week yet to see full results but I can alreAdy tell the difference! My face is glowing doesn't look so dull or tired. I recommend this to anyone needing an extra boost for your skin :) it feels ah-mazing! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Unlike other products, the Neutrogena® Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream leaves your face feeling clean and refreshed. Not greasy and weighed down. It's subtle scent isn't to overpowering providing just the right amount to give you that after a shower feeling. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena® Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream is absolutely awesome. It make my skin feel smooth and bright.I use it twice a day and I did noticed a difference in my skin texture.overall I liked it very much and I recommend it to my friends and family. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received the Neutrogena® Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream and started using it right away. The product is well packaged. It goes smoothly on ur skin and does good job at brightening your complexion. However, it does not moisturize enough. So if u have a dry skin, I would skin it. Overall, good product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really loved the texture of this cream, it's smooth. The pink color looks so soothing and very different from the cream found in the market today. I have been using it for about a week now morning and night and I feel my skin looks more shiny and soft. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Neutrogena® Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream was moisturizing and skin softening. Still, I didn't get the radiant glow I was hoping for with this. I think it still worked well for hydrating skin and I liked the gel based formula. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer feels great on my skin. Its lightweight, absorbs quickly and isn't greasy on my face. It has a nice, light scent the isnt too overwhelming. When I apply it to my skin, it makes my skin feel moisturized and brighter. The packaging is cute and I love the pink color of the container. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried out Neutrogena's new Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream and I am so happy I did. It smells so good and leaves your face feeling super hydrated without being oily. My skin felt so much softer, smoother and brighter after using this product! I highly recommend! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love this stuff . Smells great but does not irritate my skin at all very light wonderful scent. Very light feel does not feel like anything is on your skin I love that it's not greasy at all. Makes my skin feel hydrated and softer looks amazing. I would highly recommend this for anyone. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Since using the neutrogena bright boost brightening gel moisturizer I have seen a visible difference in my skin. It definitely does look brighter. I like the way it feels upon application. It smells nice too. The one downside for me is that it is potted. I have used the moisture boost moisturizer as well and had the same complaint. I wish they used a pump instead. Overall the product is great I just wish the packaging were different. Would definitely recommend [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am really happy with this product. You can see a immediate bright boost as soon as you apply an rub into your skin. Highly impressed with this product and plan to buy more once this is gone. It has a very nice smell an well as makes your skin so smooth an soft. It even helps apply my make up better for a smoother more polished finish. I received the product as a sample on Neutrogena® brand site [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It has a good consistency, very light. doesn't leave a sticky or heavy feeling like that of a cream or lotion. The packaging is also extremely excessive. the pot is way bigger than what is needed to hold the amount of product. Yes it gives it an expensive look and feel, but it's just not necessary. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love th packaging of this Gel Moisturizer! Bright and cheerful! Makes me WANT to try this item. Upon opening , it has very little scent, if any. The gel was thick but not too thick on my finger. I applied a dime size amount to my entire face and it covered it and absorbed quickly! I have noticed with 2 days useage my face is softer and the fine lines seem to be less noticable around my eyes! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using the Neutrogena Bright Boost Brightening Gel for the past 5 days (once in the morning and once at night) and already notice a difference in my face. My face looks more radiant and has a smoother complexion. I already see my dark spots appearing lighter in color and look forward to seeing the results in the next few weeks! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received the Neutrogena Bright Boost Brightening Gel Moisturizer Face Cream in exchange for my review. This stuff smells AMAZING!!! It makes my face super soft and really does brighten my face! Best moisturizer I've tried yet! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

First of all, I love the pink packaging. It looks feminine and luxurious. The face cream is moisturizing, it smooths on well, it absorbs well, and it does help brighten up my skin. I love how glittery and pretty it looks in the jar and the smell it quite nice. I've been using it for about a week and I am loving it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
